On 5/1/07, gabrielcooper <gabriel.cooper@...> wrote:
>
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <saff@...> wrote:
> >
> > El,
> >
> > Thanks for posting your solution.  I'd love to make it so that kind of
> > customization is easier in the future.  Would you mind posting a feature
> > request on SourceForge, so we can look at it for an upcoming release?
>
> I believe I did that a month or so ago for this feature.


I was unclear in my wording.  We're still considering whether to include
LightweightParameters directly into the core JUnit, or using a different way
to allow custom naming.  However, I feel that the current way of creating a
custom runner to do this requires too much code reading and duplication.  So
I actually see two feature requests here:

1) A better API to customize naming
2) A particular out-of-the-box use of that API, which includes more than the
ordinal number of the failing parameter set.

Thanks,

   David Saff
